name: Filepass
tagline: Let users use a file instead of password without uploading to your server.
body:
### Welcome to FilePass Homepage.
This page here is the official homepage for FilePass project. You can find links to jQuery plugin in the sidebar or to browser extensions below...

### Browser Extensions
You can download FilePass as an extension for some of the popular browsers:

### How to use in website?
Include filepass.css and filepass.jquery.js (and jQuery!) in your page, then simply call ```.filepass()``` on any elements you like (text field, password, textarea...)

Example:

``` ('#my-field').filepass() ```

### Authors and Contributors
Created by Pooya Eghbali (@pooya-eghbali)

### Support or Contact
Contact me at [persian.writer at gmail]
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
